cards.name: The Dragon's Tail
cards.text: Action: Choose an opponent. You and that player each draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: The comet's tail spread across the dawn, a red slash that bled above the crags of Dragonstone like a wound in the pink and purple sky.

cards.name: Robb Stark
cards.text: Renown. During [military] challenges, Robb Stark gets +1 STR for each loyal character you control. Action: While Robb Stark is participating in a [military] challenge, choose a participating non-King character. Stand and remove that character from the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: Riverrun
cards.text: Reaction: After power is gained by or moved to a House Tully character, kneel Riverrun to have that character gain 1 power.

cards.name: Ser Colen of Greenpools
cards.text: During [power] challenges, Ser Colen of Greenpools gets +3 STR.

cards.name: Bitterbridge Encampment
cards.text: Reaction: After a Summer plot card is revealed, kneel Bitterbridge Encampment. Then, each player may put a character into play from his or her hand.

cards.name: Arry
cards.text: Ambush (4). If you control Arya Stark, sacrifice Arry. Action: Return Arry to your hand to draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: At Winterfell they had called her "Arya Horseface" and she'd thought nothing could be worse...

cards.name: White Tree
cards.text: Reaction: After an opponent collects income, kneel White Tree to move 1 gold from that player's gold pool to your own.
cards.flavor: It was the end of the world. And we are going beyond it.

cards.name: White Raven
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, sacrifice White Raven. Reaction: After you win dominance, if there is a Summer or Winter plot card revealed, gain 1 power for your faction.

cards.name: Ruby of R'hllor
cards.text: R'hllor character only. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which attached character is attacking, name a card. The losing opponent reveals his or her hand and discards each card with that name.

cards.name: Janos Slynt
cards.text: Intimidate. Action: Pay 1 gold to give Janos Slynt +2 STR until the end of the phase.
cards.flavor: "And this so-called Lord of Harrenhal is a butcher's whelp upjumped by the Lannisters. Small wonder he is venal and corrupt." <cite>Ser Denys Mallister</cite>

cards.name: Levies at the Rock
cards.text: Reaction: After a player initiates a challenge against you, move up to X gold from that player's gold pool to your own. X is the number of attacking characters.

cards.name: Captain's Daughter
cards.text: Reaction: After a non-loyal character enters play, kneel your faction card and sacrifice Captain's Daughter to put that character onto the top of it's owner's deck.
cards.flavor: Her father had forbidden her to come ashore, but whenever Theon came to Lordsport he spied her wandering forlornly about the deck.

cards.name: Pyke
cards.text: Action: Kneel Pyke to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.
cards.flavor: The point of land on which the Greyjoys had raised their fortress had once thrust like a sword into the bowels of the ocean, but the waves had hammered at it day and night until the land broke and shattered, thousands of years past.

cards.name: Viserys Targaryen
cards.text: While Viserys Targaryen is attacking, each King character must be declared as a defender, if able. Interrupt: When the dominance phase ends, if no opponent controls a King character, Viserys Targaryen gains 1 power.

cards.name: Shierak Qiya
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to choose and stand a participating character.
cards.flavor: The dothraki named the comet shierak qiya, the Bleeding Star.

cards.name: Harmen Uller
cards.text: Renown. Each Sand Snake character in your hand gains ambush (X). X is 1 less than that card's printed cost.

cards.name: Tower of the Sun
cards.text: Reaction: After an event is played, gain 1 gold. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: ...the last light of the afternoon was slanting down through thick windows of many-colored glass to dapple the pale marble with diamonds of half a hundred colors.

cards.name: Pyromancers
cards.text: Dominance Action: Kneel Pyromancers and discard 1 power from your faction card to choose a non-limited location, and discard it from play.
cards.flavor: The pyromancers said that only three things burned hotter than their substance: dragonflame, the fires beneath the earth, and the summer sun.

cards.name: Rains of Autumn
cards.text: Characters and locations do not provide positive gold modifiers.

cards.name: Varys's Riddle
cards.text: When Revealed: Initiate the when revealed ability on a revealed non-Riddle plot card as if you had just revealed it.
cards.flavor: "In a room sit three great men, a king, a priest, and a rich man with his gold. Between them stands a sellsword, a little man of common birth and no great mind. Each of the great ones bids him slay the other two." <cite>Varys</cite>
